title: tributors workflow needs just a little bit more love
body:
although after the #5611 (thanks @jwodder) we got it to submit a PR (#5618) workflow still [errored out](https://github.com/datalad/datalad/runs/2471136268?check_suite_focus=true) with

```
Error: Unable to process command '::set-env name=PULL_REQUEST_NUMBER::5618' successfully.
Error: The `set-env` command is disabled. Please upgrade to using Environment Files or opt into unsecure command execution by setting the `ACTIONS_ALLOW_UNSECURE_COMMANDS` environment variable to `true`. For more information see: https://github.blog/changelog/2020-10-01-github-actions-deprecating-set-env-and-add-path-commands/
Error: Unable to process command '::set-env name=PULL_REQUEST_RETURN_CODE::0' successfully.
Error: The `set-env` command is disabled. Please upgrade to using Environment Files or opt into unsecure command execution by setting the `ACTIONS_ALLOW_UNSECURE_COMMANDS` environment variable to `true`. For more information see: https://github.blog/changelog/2020-10-01-github-actions-deprecating-set-env-and-add-path-commands/
Error: Unable to process command '::set-env name=PULL_REQUEST_URL::https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/5618' successfully.
Error: The `set-env` command is disabled. Please upgrade to using Environment Files or opt into unsecure command execution by setting the `ACTIONS_ALLOW_UNSECURE_COMMANDS` environment variable to `true`. For more information see: https://github.blog/changelog/2020-10-01-github-actions-deprecating-set-env-and-add-path-commands/
```

Filed #5619 which might resolve it
